column1: obituary for: gesley keane | surls funeral homes| gesley keane age 80 of williams died on wednesday june 17
column2: 2015 at the israel family hospice house in ames. memorial services will be 10:30 a. m. saturday
column3: july 10th at the st. mary's catholic church in williams with inurnment in the church cemetery. the surls funeral home of williams is in charge of arrangements.
